text: f'ila dhlk aldiyn alqyim aldhy shreh allah llanbya' wwssahm bh, fade -ayha alrswl- eibad allh, wastaqim kama amrk allh, wala tatabie 'ahwa' aladhin shkku fi alhaqu wanhrfu ean aldyn, wql: sddaqt bjmye alkutub almnzlt min alsama' ealaa alanbya', wamrny rabiy 'an aedl baynakum fi alhkm, allah rabuna wrbkm, lana thawab 'aemaluna alsalht, walakum jaza'an 'aemalakum alsyyt, la khswmt wala jidal baynana wabaynakum baedama tabayan alhq, allah yajmae baynana wabaynakum yawm alqyamt, fyqdy baynana bialhaqi fima aikhtalafna fyh, wa'iilayh almrje walmab, fyjazy kla bima ysthq
